5coins re-born with iOS7

5coins 2.0 is the biggest change since its first release. It works perfectly in iOS 7 with the beautiful new design. I rewrote the entire code base from ground up to make sure every little detail has been touched. You can easily record your expenses with just one hand. Download the latest version now.

Instagram Engineering Challenge: The Unshredder

I spent couple of hours on this challenge, and finally worked out a solution. I tested the solution with 15 different photos, the result went really well. Except for one photo which has constant sky color, all other photos were all completely restored. The steps of solution are: Cut the shredded photo in to sections Compare right side of each section with left sides of others and score and sort the matches Check if there are cases that more than one sections connect with the same sec...
